name: DCS Hornet Device
description:
You can control DCS World's F/A-18C Hornet AMPCD & UFC with your mobile phone or pad.

You can use this app whether you use 1 monitor or 2 monitor.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y3aSLqFJGmQ&t=117s
This link shows you how to use this app with your 1 or 2 monitors.

Before you use this app, download Hornet AMPCD & UFC Demo version first and make sure you can use this app with your computer.

You must download server file first and run it for this app.
https://www.dropbox.com/s/s0qeuhk552n0d63/DCS%20Device%20Server%202.03.zip?dl=0

You can see manual at this link https://cduapp.tistory.com/33
This manual is currently WIP and will update soon.
